title: Backuper
description: Backuper is a C# WPF desktop app for Windows that automates folder and file backups. It supports a unique version limit for each backup and performs automatic cleanup of older backups.

title: SuperSold
description: An ASP.NET Core MVC marketplace where users can register, upload products, and simulate buying and selling. Features include user authentication, product management, and a responsive interface.

title: Password Manager
description: A secure password manager for WPF and CLI platforms, offering secure storage and management of passwords and emails.

title: MealPicker
description: A WPF application that retrieves random recipes from a third party API and presents them in a user-friendly format. It supports custom themes and securely encrypts the user API key.
